actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to require that the containers in which distilled spirits, wine, and beer are sold shall be reusable containers.

summary.text: Requires, under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, that the containers in which distilled spirits, wine, and beer are sold shall be reusable containers. (Adds 26 U.S.C. 5563)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to require that the containers in which distilled spirits, wine, and beer are sold shall be reusable containers.
